events.Title: Merchant Deal
events.Description: A merchant offers you a deal.

Options.Description: Accept (+10 Gold, -5 Reputation)
Decline (+5 Reputation)

events.Title: Wolf Attack
events.Description: A pack of wolves threatens your sheep!

Options.Description: Defend (-2 Sheep)
Ignore (-5 Sheep)

events.Title: A Mysterious Stranger
events.Description: A hooded figure offers you an old map. Will you take it?

Options.Description: Accept the map (-10 Gold, +5 Reputation)
Decline (-5 Reputation)

events.Title: Treasure Hunt
events.Description: Following the map, you reach an ancient ruin. What will you do?

Options.Description: Dig for treasure (+20 Gold, 20% risk of injury)
Leave the ruin (+5 Reputation)

events.Title: A Noble's Request
events.Description: A noble asks you to deliver a secret letter to the royal court.

Options.Description: Deliver the letter (+10 Nobles Affinity, -5 Merchant Affinity)
Refuse (-5 Nobles Affinity, +5 Reputation)

events.Title: Merchant Guild Dispute
events.Description: Two rival merchants argue over a trade deal. Who do you support?

Options.Description: Support Merchant A (+10 Merchant Affinity, -5 Reputation)
Support Merchant B (+10 Reputation, -5 Merchant Affinity)

events.Title: Bandit Ambush
events.Description: Bandits block the road, demanding a toll. How will you respond?

Options.Description: Pay the toll (-15 Gold, +5 Reputation)
Fight back (-5 Militia Affinity, 50% risk of injury)

events.Title: A Harsh Winter
events.Description: The winter is particularly brutal, and your sheep are struggling.

Options.Description: Buy extra feed (-10 Gold, +5 Sheep)
Let nature take its course (-3 Sheep, +5 Gold)

events.Title: A Secret Society
events.Description: A group of masked individuals invites you to a clandestine meeting.

Options.Description: Attend the meeting (-10 Gold, +5 Reputation)
Refuse and report to the nobles (+10 Nobles Affinity, -5 Reputation)

events.Title: The Lost Traveler
events.Description: A weary traveler arrives in your village, begging for food and shelter.

Options.Description: Offer food and shelter (-5 Gold, +10 Reputation)
Turn him away (+5 Gold, -10 Reputation)

events.Title: Grateful Traveler
events.Description: The traveler, now well-rested, offers you a rare artifact in gratitude.

Options.Description: Accept the artifact (+15 Gold, +5 Reputation)
Refuse and ask him to leave (+10 Reputation)

events.Title: Noble's Heir in Trouble
events.Description: A young noble is caught in a scandal. His family seeks your help in silencing rumors.

Options.Description: Help cover up the scandal (+10 Nobles Affinity, -5 Reputation)
Expose the truth (-10 Nobles Affinity, +10 Reputation)

events.Title: The Merchant’s Gamble
events.Description: A wealthy merchant offers a risky investment opportunity.

Options.Description: Invest 20 Gold (50% chance to earn +40 Gold)
Decline (-5 Merchant Affinity)

events.Title: A Suspicious Shipment
events.Description: A group of armed men is seen unloading crates in the dead of night.

Options.Description: Investigate the shipment (+5 Militia Affinity, risk of retaliation)
Ignore it (-5 Reputation, +10 Gold)

events.Title: Black Market Raid
events.Description: The shipment contained smuggled weapons. The smugglers retaliate!

Options.Description: Fight them off (-5 Militia Affinity, +10 Reputation)
Bribe them to leave (-15 Gold)

events.Title: A Harsh Winter
events.Description: A brutal winter has caused food shortages in the village.

Options.Description: Distribute food to the poor (-10 Gold, +10 Reputation)
Hoard supplies for yourself (+10 Gold, -10 Reputation)

events.Title: A Secret Letter
events.Description: A sealed letter arrives for you, marked with a noble’s crest.

Options.Description: Deliver it to the intended recipient (+5 Nobles Affinity)
Open and read it (-5 Nobles Affinity, chance to uncover a secret)

events.Title: Noble Conspiracy
events.Description: The letter reveals a plot against the ruling house. What will you do?

Options.Description: Warn the nobles (+10 Nobles Affinity, -5 Reputation)
Keep it secret (+15 Reputation, -10 Nobles Affinity)

events.Title: A Noble's Request
events.Description: A noble asks you to increase the taxes on merchants. How do you respond?

Options.Description: Approve the tax hike (+10 Nobles Affinity, -10 Merchant Affinity)
Reject the tax increase (-10 Nobles Affinity, +10 Merchant Affinity)

events.Title: Merchant Protest
events.Description: Angered by the new taxes, the merchants organize a protest in the marketplace.

Options.Description: Send the militia to disperse them (-5 Militia Affinity, +5 Nobles Affinity)
Negotiate with the merchants (+5 Merchant Affinity, -5 Nobles Affinity)

events.Title: Militia Training Request
events.Description: The militia requests additional funding for better training.

Options.Description: Provide funding (-15 Gold, +10 Militia Affinity)
Refuse funding (-10 Militia Affinity, +5 Nobles Affinity)

events.Title: Militia Gains Power
events.Description: With increased funding, the militia starts exerting more influence in the region.

Options.Description: Encourage their growth (+10 Militia Affinity, -5 Nobles Affinity)
Warn them not to overstep (-10 Militia Affinity, +5 Nobles Affinity)

events.Title: A Secret Merchant Deal
events.Description: A powerful merchant offers you a deal that could anger the nobles.

Options.Description: Accept the deal (+15 Merchant Affinity, -10 Nobles Affinity)
Refuse to avoid conflict (+5 Nobles Affinity, -5 Merchant Affinity)

events.Title: Noble Retaliation
events.Description: The nobles respond by imposing trade restrictions, angering the merchants.

Options.Description: Support the merchants (-10 Nobles Affinity, +10 Merchant Affinity)
Side with the nobles (+10 Nobles Affinity, -10 Merchant Affinity)

events.Title: The King's Decree
events.Description: The king has issued a decree that will greatly affect the balance of power in your village.

Options.Description: Support the decree (+15 Nobles Affinity, -10 Merchant Affinity, -5 Militia Affinity)
Oppose the decree (-15 Nobles Affinity, +10 Merchant Affinity, +5 Militia Affinity)

events.Title: Merchant Backlash
events.Description: The merchants are furious and threaten to cut off supplies to the village.

Options.Description: Appease the merchants (-10 Nobles Affinity, +10 Merchant Affinity)
Ignore their threats (-5 Gold, -10 Merchant Affinity)

events.Title: Noble Retribution
events.Description: The nobles are enraged by your defiance and threaten to seize your land.

Options.Description: Beg for forgiveness (-10 Reputation, +5 Nobles Affinity)
Defy them (+10 Militia Affinity, -15 Nobles Affinity)

events.Title: Civil Unrest
events.Description: The village is on the brink of civil war due to growing tensions.

Options.Description: Side with the nobles (-15 Militia Affinity, +15 Nobles Affinity)
Join the militia rebellion (+15 Militia Affinity, -15 Nobles Affinity)

events.Title: Revolution Outcome
events.Description: The battle has ended. A new order is established.

Options.Description: The nobles win (Noble Dominance Ending)
The militia takes over (Militia Dictatorship Ending)

events.Title: Noble Dominance
events.Description: The nobles have consolidated their power. You live under their rule.

Options.Description: Game Over - Restart

events.Title: Militia Rule
events.Description: The militia has seized control, ruling the village with an iron fist.

Options.Description: Game Over - Restart

events.Title: The Howling at Midnight
events.Description: Lately, you've heard eerie howls echoing through the night. Some villagers whisper about an ancient curse.

Options.Description: Investigate the forest at night (-5 Reputation, risk of injury)
Ignore the rumors (+5 Nobles Affinity, -5 Reputation)

events.Title: Wolf Encounter
events.Description: You find tracks leading deep into the woods. A pair of glowing eyes stare back at you.

Options.Description: Follow the creature (-10 Gold, risk of ambush)
Run back to the village (-10 Reputation, -5 Militia Affinity)

events.Title: The Marked One
events.Description: A strange figure greets you. 'You have been chosen.' A bite burns into your arm.

Options.Description: Accept your fate (+10 Reputation, -10 Nobles Affinity)
Reject the curse (-5 Reputation, risk of exile)

events.Title: Cursed Rejection
events.Description: The villagers sense something is different about you. They start avoiding you.

Options.Description: Flee into the wilderness (-20 Reputation, -10 Merchant Affinity)
Convince them you're normal (+10 Nobles Affinity, -5 Reputation)

events.Title: The Moonlit Trial
events.Description: You feel different under the full moon. The power inside you grows.

Options.Description: Embrace the transformation (+10 Reputation, +10 Militia Affinity)
Resist it (-10 Reputation, risk of exposure)

events.Title: The Wolf Ritual
events.Description: A pack of wolves surrounds you. They bow as if recognizing you as one of their own.

Options.Description: Swear loyalty to the wolf pack (+15 Reputation, -10 Nobles Affinity)
Run back to the village (-10 Reputation, risk of being hunted)

events.Title: The Wolf King Prophecy
events.Description: The elder wolf speaks. 'The Wolf King shall rise when the village is weak.'

Options.Description: Prepare for the prophecy (+20 Militia Affinity, -10 Merchant Affinity)
Ignore it (+10 Nobles Affinity, -10 Reputation)

events.Title: The Final Night
events.Description: The village is vulnerable. The moon is full. The wolves are waiting for your command.

Options.Description: Lead the wolves into the village (Wolf King Ending)
Abandon the wolves (+10 Reputation, -10 Militia Affinity)

events.Title: Wolf King Ending
events.Description: You have become the Wolf King. The village now belongs to the pack.

Options.Description: Game Over - Restart
